system.description: The character is a specialist in hand-to-hand combat, able to fight effectively even when completely unarmed.
system.benefit: Character gains Deadly Natural Weapons Trait, and counts as armed even whilst facing a weapon wielding opponent whilst barehanded (or using their own natural weapons). Whilst fighting barehanded they can re-roll the damage they inflict.

specialAbilities.name: Deadly Natural Weapons & Damage Reroll
specialAbilities.description: Your unarmed attacks deal 1d10+SB damage without the Primitive quality. You count as armed when fighting unarmed, and can reroll damage.
